verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H4150><s%>, Concerning the feasts of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> to be holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations <S%H4744><s%>, even these are my feasts <S%H4150><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall work <S%H4399><s%> be done <S%H6213><s%>: but the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of rest <S%H7677><s%>, a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no work <S%H4399><s%> in it it is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.
These are the feasts <S%H4150><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, even holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations <S%H4744><s%>, which you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> in their seasons <S%H4150><s%>.
In the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> at evening <S%H6153><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s passover <S%H6453><s%>.

And on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the same month <S%H2320><s%> is the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you must eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>.
In the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall have an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>: you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no labor intensive <S%H5656><s%> work in it <S%H4399><s%>.

But you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>: you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no labor intensive <S%H5656><s%> work in it <S%H4399><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H935><s%>, When you be come into the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> unto you <S%H7114><s%>, and shall reap the harvest <S%H7105><s%> there <S%H935><s%>, then you shall bring a sheaf <S%H6016><s%> of the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> of your harvest <S%H7105><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>:

And he shall wave <S%H5130><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to be accepted <S%H7522><s%> for you <S%H4283><s%>: on the next day after the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave it <S%H5130><s%>.

And you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> when you wave <S%H5130><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> an he lamb <S%H3532><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the food offering <S%H4503><s%> there shall be two <S%H8147><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%>: and the drink offering <S%H5262><s%> there shall be of wine <S%H3196><s%>, the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%>.

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> neither bread <S%H3899><s%>, nor parched corn <S%H7039><s%>, nor green ears <S%H3759><s%>, until the same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H5704><s%> you have brought <S%H935><s%> an offering <S%H7133><s%> unto your God <S%H430><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.

And you shall count <S%H5608><s%> unto you from the next day <S%H4283><s%> after the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, from the day <S%H3117><s%> that you brought <S%H935><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> of the wave offering <S%H8573><s%>; seven <S%H7651><s%> sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> complete <S%H8549><s%>:

Even unto <S%H5704><s%> the next day <S%H4283><s%> after the seventh <S%H7637><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%> shall you number <S%H5608><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; and you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> food offering <S%H4503><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

You shall bring out <S%H935><s%> of your habitations <S%H4186><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> wave <S%H8573><s%> loaves <S%H3899><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%>: they shall be of fine flour <S%H5560><s%>; they shall be baked <S%H644><s%> with yeast <S%H2557><s%>; they are the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> with the bread <S%H3899><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>: they shall be for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, with their food offering <S%H4503><s%>, and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%>, even an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Then you shall sacrifice <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, with the two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>: they shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for the priest <S%H3548><s%>.

And you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> on the same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, that it may be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> unto you <S%H6213><s%>: you shall do no labor intensive <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> in it it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

And when you reap <S%H7114><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%>, you shall not make clean riddance <S%H3615><s%> of the corners <S%H6285><s%> of your field <S%H7704><s%> when you reapest <S%H7114><s%>, neither shall you gather <S%H3950><s%> any gleaning <S%H3951><s%> of your harvest <S%H7105><s%>: you shall leave <S%H5800><s%> them unto the poor <S%H6041><s%>, and to the stranger <S%H1616><s%>: I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, In the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, shall you have a sabbath <S%H7677><s%>, a memorial <S%H2146><s%> of blowing <S%H8643><s%> of trumpets <S%H6944><s%>, an holy convocation <S%H4744><s%>.
You shall do <S%H6213><s%> no labor intensive <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> in it but you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Also <S%H389><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of this seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> there shall be a day <S%H3117><s%> of atonement <S%H3725><s%>: it shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> unto you <S%H6031><s%>; and you shall afflict your souls <S%H5315><s%>, and offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no work <S%H4399><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>: for it is a day <S%H3117><s%> of atonement <S%H3725><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
For whatever soul <S%H5315><s%> it be that shall not be afflicted <S%H6031><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, he shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And whatever soul <S%H5315><s%> it be that does <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, the same soul <S%H5315><s%> will I destroy <S%H6><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.
You shall do <S%H6213><s%> no manner of work <S%H4399><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.

It shall be unto you a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of rest <S%H7677><s%>, and you shall afflict <S%H6031><s%> your souls <S%H5315><s%>: in the ninth <S%H8672><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%> at evening <S%H6153><s%>, from evening <S%H6153><s%> unto evening <S%H6153><s%>, shall you celebrate <S%H7673><s%> your sabbath <S%H7676><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> shall be the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
On the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>: you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no labor intensive <S%H5656><s%> work in it <S%H4399><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> unto you <S%H7126><s%>; and you shall offer an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: it is a solemn assembly <S%H6116><s%>; and you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no labor intensive <S%H5656><s%> work in it <S%H4399><s%>.

These are the feasts <S%H4150><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> to be holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations <S%H4744><s%>, to offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and a food offering <S%H4503><s%>, a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>, and drink offerings <S%H5262><s%>, every thing <S%H1697><s%> upon his <S%H3117><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>:

Beside the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and beside your gifts <S%H4979><s%>, and beside all your vows <S%H5088><s%>, and beside all your freewill offerings <S%H5071><s%>, which you give <S%H5414><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Also in the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, when you have gathered <S%H622><s%> in the fruit <S%H8393><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2282><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: on the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a sabbath <S%H7677><s%>, and on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a sabbath <S%H7677><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> you on the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of good <S%H1926><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%>, branches <S%H3709><s%> of palm <S%H8558><s%> trees <S%H6057><s%>, and the boughs of thick <S%H5687><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%>, and willows <S%H6155><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%>; and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> it a feast <S%H2282><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%>. It shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%>: you shall celebrate <S%H2287><s%> it in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.

You shall live <S%H3427><s%> in shelters <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; all that are Israelites <S%H3478><s%> born <S%H249><s%> shall live <S%H3427><s%> in shelters <S%H5521><s%>:

That your generations <S%H1755><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> that I made the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> in shelters <S%H5521><s%>, when I brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> declared <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the feasts <S%H4150><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
